question: The flagship free medicine scheme of which state secured the first rank from the National Health Mission?
explanation:
Rajasthanâ€™s flagship free medicine scheme, launched in 2011-12, has once again secured the first rank from the National Health Mission.The State registered 94.59% of online free medicine distribution at counters in public health facilities and 84.76% use of the drugs and vaccine distribution management system at primary health centres. Rajasthan Mukhyamantri Nishulk Dava Yojana was launched on 2nd October 2011. It has 2 components:
1. Free Medicines: To provide commonly-used essential medicines free of cost to patients visiting government healthcare institutions (introduced on 2nd October 2011), and
2. Free Tests: To provide free tests (introduced on 7th April 2013)
